title: Comment on Miss Universe 2016-2017 Pageant: Top 13 Contestants Revealed LIVE by Anonymous

Miss Universe 2016-2017 Pageant: Top 13 Contestants Revealed LIVE Published Updated 8:01 pm EDT, January 29, 2017 57 Comments By Lauren Weigle 1.5m Share Tweet Follow Miss Universe 2016 - 2017 Top 13 Winners It's the 2016 - 2017 Miss Universe Pageant and 86 contestants are hoping to win the crown. Steve Harvey and Ashley Graham are the hosts of the event with Flo Rida and Boyz II Men as the musical guests. But, let's get down to what you're really interested in ... the winners. Check out the top 13 contestants as they are announced live. Twelve of these finalists were selected by the Miss Universe Organization and one was chosen by at-home voters. Click through our gallery as it's updated live. (Instagram) Next Image: top-13-miss-universe Lauren Weigle is a senior contributor to Heavy specializing in celebrity and reality television. She has an extensive background in entertainment, fashion, PR, lifestyle and journalism. Follow her on Twitter @NYCPRTeam . January 29, 2017 8:01 pm
